00029 RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::Dialog( int w, int h ){
00030   this->width=w;
00031   this->height=h;
00032   center( w, h );
00033   caption=new Caption( WORD_WRAPPED, "", xPos+1, yPos+1, width-1, height-4 );
00034   nbButton=0;
00035 }

00041 
00042 }

00049 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::center( int w, int h ){
00050   this->xPos= (SLtt_Screen_Cols/2)-(width/2); 
00051   this->yPos= (SLtt_Screen_Rows/2)-(height/2);
00052 }
00053 
00058 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawDialog(){
00059   drawEmpty();
00060   drawBorder();
00061   drawShadow();
00062   if (title.length()>0)
00063     drawTitle();
00064 
00065   drawCaption();
00066   drawButtons();
00067 }
00068 
00072 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawEmpty(){
00073   SLsmg_set_color (1);
00074 
00075   for (int y=yPos; y<yPos+height; y++){
00076     SLsmg_gotorc (y, xPos);
00077     for (int x=xPos; x<xPos+width; x++){
00078 
00079       SLsmg_printf( " " );
00080     }
00081   }
00082   SLsmg_set_color (0);
00083 }
00084 
00088 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawBorder(){
00089   //The lightgray border
00090   SLsmg_set_color (8);
00091 
00092   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos, xPos);
00093   SLsmg_set_char_set (1); //Use the alt charset
00094 
00095   // The top line
00096   SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_ULCORN_CHAR);
00097   SLsmg_draw_hline(width-1);
00098 
00099   // The left border
00100   for (int y=1; y<height; y++){
00101     SLsmg_gotorc (yPos+y, xPos);
00102 
00103     if (y==height-3)
00104       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_LTEE_CHAR);
00105     else if (y==height-1)
00106       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_LLCORN_CHAR);
00107     else
00108       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_VLINE_CHAR);
00109   }
00110 
00111   // The buttonbar line
00112   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos+height-3, xPos+1);
00113   SLsmg_draw_hline(width-1);
00114 
00115   // The gray border
00116   SLsmg_set_color (9);
00117 
00118   for (int y=0; y<height; y++){
00119     SLsmg_gotorc (yPos+y, xPos+width);
00120 
00121     if (y==0)
00122       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_URCORN_CHAR);
00123     else if (y==height-3)
00124       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_RTEE_CHAR);
00125     else if (y==height-1)
00126       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_LRCORN_CHAR);
00127     else
00128       SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_VLINE_CHAR);
00129   }
00130 
00131   // The bottom line
00132   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos+height-1, xPos+1);
00133   SLsmg_draw_hline(width-1);
00134 
00135   SLsmg_set_char_set(0); //Use the normal charset
00136   SLsmg_set_color(0);
00137 }
00138 
00142 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawShadow(){
00143   SLsmg_set_color(5);
00144 
00145 
00146   for (int y=yPos+1; y<yPos+height+1; y++){
00147     SLsmg_gotorc (y, xPos+width+1);
00148     SLsmg_printf( "  " );
00149   }
00150 
00151   for (int x=xPos+1; x<xPos+width+3; x++){
00152     SLsmg_gotorc (yPos+height, x);
00153     SLsmg_printf( " " );
00154   }
00155 
00156   SLsmg_set_color(0);
00157 }

00176 const char* RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::getTitle(){
00177   return title.c_str();

00183 const char* RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::getMessage(){
00184   return caption->getText().c_str();

00190 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawTitle(){
00191   int l=title.length();
00192   int x=(SLtt_Screen_Cols/2)-(l/2);
00193 
00194   SLsmg_set_color (8);
00195 
00196 
00197   SLsmg_set_char_set (1); //Use the alt charset
00198   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos, x-2);
00199   SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_RTEE_CHAR);
00200   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos, x+l+1);
00201   SLsmg_write_char(SLSMG_LTEE_CHAR);
00202 
00203   //title
00204   SLsmg_set_color (9);
00205   SLsmg_gotorc (yPos, x-1);
00206   SLsmg_set_char_set (0); //Use the alt charset
00207 
00208   SLsmg_printf( " %s ", title.c_str() );
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00215 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawCaption(){
00216   SLsmg_set_color (9);
00217   caption->draw();
00218 }

00224 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::addButton(PushButton* pb){
00225   if (nbButton<3){
00226     switch(nbButton){
00227     case 0:
00228       btn1=pb;
00229       break;
00230 
00231     case 1:
00232       btn2=pb;
00233       break;
00234 
00235     case 2:
00236       btn3=pb;
00237       break;
00238     }
00239     nbButton++;
00240   }
00241 }
00242 
00247 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::drawButtons(){
00248   if (nbButton==1){
00249     btn1->setSize( 8, 1 );
00250     btn1->setY( height-1 );
00251     btn1->setX( (width/2)-4 );
00252     btn1->draw( xPos, yPos );
00253   }
00254 }
00255 
00260 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::Dialog::receiveKeyEvent(int ch){
00261   if (ch==13){ //ENTER
00262     btn1->fireAction();
00263   }
00264 }
